library(dplyr)

indexes <- c('^BVSP', '^GSPC', '^FTSE', '^N225')

df_indices <- yfR::yf_get(indexes, 
                          '2010-01-01',
                          Sys.Date())

tab_tidy <- df_indices %>%
  group_by(ticker) %>%
  summarise(mean_ret = mean(ret_adjusted_prices, na.rm = TRUE),
            max_ret = max(ret_adjusted_prices, na.rm = TRUE),
            min_ret = min(ret_adjusted_prices, na.rm = TRUE))

print(tab_tidy)
